means: 无功受禄的，不配的，不当的

sentence.Network_en: In fact the pressure comes from subjective feelings and the aftermath of the unmerited reaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 真正的压力来自主观的感受,或者反应不当所带来的后果.

sentence.Network_en: Nothing but contempt is due to those people who ask us to submit to unmerited oppression.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于那些要求我们服从我们不能受之压迫的人,我们有的只是轻蔑.

1. 恩典是人不配得的(undeserved),不是靠自己努力赚取的(unearned), 不是靠功德获得的  (unmerited).
